Interface Canvas

All Known Implementing Classes:
Factory
public interface Canvas
Represents the canvas of canvas viewer user interface into which 2D figures will be displayed.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    Collection<Figure>
    getFigures()
    Returns the 2D geometric figures of this canvas.
    int
    getHeight()
    Returns the height of this canvas.
    String
    getId()
    Returns a unique identifier for this canvas model.
    String
    getName()
    Returns the name of this canvas.
    Style
    getStyle()
    Returns a Style object characterizing how this figure should be displayed.
    int
    getWidth()
    Returns the width of this canvas.
    void
    setId(String id)
    Sets the identifier of this canvas model.

  • Method Details

    • getId

      String getId()
      Returns a unique identifier for this canvas model.
      Returns:
      A unique String identifier.

    • setId

      void setId(String id)
      Sets the identifier of this canvas model.
      Parameters:
      id - A unique String identifier.

    • getName

      String getName()
      Returns the name of this canvas.
      Returns:
      A non null non empty String name.

    • getWidth

      int getWidth()
      Returns the width of this canvas.
      Returns:
      A positive int value for the width in pixels of this canvas.

    • getHeight

      int getHeight()
      Returns the height of this canvas.
      Returns:
      A positive int value for the height in pixels of this canvas.

    • getFigures

      Collection<Figure> getFigures()
      Returns the 2D geometric figures of this canvas.
      Returns:
      A Collection of Figure objects.

    • getStyle

      Style getStyle()
      Returns a Style object characterizing how this figure should be displayed.
      Returns:
      A Style object. If null is returned, the default user interface style properties will be used.
